bugs.description: The DecompressionMiddleware references `zipfile.BadZipfile` in the `_is_zip` method, but in Python 3 the correct exception name is `zipfile.BadZipFile` (note the capital 'F'). Using the wrong exception class will result in an `AttributeError: module 'zipfile' has no attribute 'BadZipfile'`, causing the middleware to crash when handling a bad ZIP archive.
